meanings.definition: Lithotriptors: devices used to break up kidney stones
meanings.sent1: The hospital used lithotriptors to help patients with kidney stones.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended using lithotriptors to treat the kidney stones.
meanings.sent3: The lithotriptors in the hospital were always busy, crushing stones all day.
meanings.sent4: The lithotriptors worked like tiny hammers, smashing the kidney stones into pieces.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the lithotriptors in action echoed through the hospital corridors.

meanings.definition: Lithotriptors: medical instruments that use shock waves to crush stones in the body
meanings.sent1: The lithotriptors in the operating room were ready to crush the stones with shock waves.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on lithotriptors to break down stones in the body.
meanings.sent3: The lithotriptors seemed like magical devices, using shock waves to crush stones effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The lithotriptors were like powerful wizards, casting shock waves to shatter the stones.
meanings.sent5: The lithotriptors' precision in targeting stones amazed the medical team.
